text:
I am facing this problem very often. I have removed all examples, webdav 
directory from the default webapps folder and created my own context for 
running my application on tomcat-4.1.27. application is running fine but after 
sometime i got error message LifeCycle Error : CL Stopped.

Pls suggest me the probable solution so that i can overcome this problem.
creator: sharma_k@comsoft-bom.com

text:
There is a long discussion on possible causes for this issue in the original 
bug report.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 3888 ***
creator: medthomas@ntlworld.com
